response:
"warum gibt es immer noch firmen, die unsere persönlichen daten sammeln und verwenden, ohne unsere zustimmung? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and use our personal data without our consent? #dataprotection #privacy #security"

this post criticizes the fact that many companies still collect and use personal data without proper consent from the individuals involved. it highlights the importance of data privacy and security, and questions why companies are not doing more to protect their customers' personal information. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and make the post more discoverable by people interested in these topics.
